scripts.clean: pnpm run cleanup && pnpm run flush
scripts.contracts:deploy: docker compose run --rm hono-api pnpm --filter @phyt/contracts deploy
scripts.db:generate: docker compose run --rm hono-api pnpm --filter @phyt/data-access db:generate
scripts.db:migrate: docker compose run --rm hono-api pnpm --filter @phyt/data-access db:migrate
scripts.db:seed: docker compose run --rm hono-api pnpm --filter @phyt/data-access db:seed
scripts.db:studio: docker compose run --rm -p 4983:4983 hono-api pnpm --filter @phyt/data-access db:studio
scripts.flush: rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf .turbo && pnpm store prune
scripts.lint: pnpm syncpack lint --dependency-types prod,dev && turbo run lint
scripts.lint:fix: pnpm syncpack fix --dependency-types prod,dev && turbo run lint:fix
scripts.up:db: pnpm run up:vault && docker compose up -d postgres
scripts.up:vault: pnpm run bootstrap && docker compose up -d vault-agent
